text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
A legend was born today! Not even<n>those in the senior year
can match<n>her!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian has become a Five<n>Crown champion!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Really... She shook off all her<n>would-be rivals.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Another interview request? How<n>many is that now?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
It hasn't stopped ringing since we left<n>the Arima Kinen
yesterday... Yes,<n>hello?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The amount of media coverage is<n>unbelievable...

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Pardon me! The calls from journalists<n>won't stopâ€”they
want to speak with<n>Narita Brian...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Brian continues to amaze me, both on<n>the course and with
the reaction<n>she's garnered...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Brian continues to amaze me, both on<n>the course and with
the reaction<n>she's garnered...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And just where is the ravenous<n>rascal herself at a time like
this?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Triple Crown champion, victory at the<n>Arima Kinen, five G1
wins...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: But the gnawing won't stop. I'm still<n>aching for more...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: When... When is the next race?!
